title: Run full test suite and build
description:
Verify all tests pass and project builds after changes.

Commands to run:
1. go build ./...
2. go test ./internal/worktree/... -v
3. go test ./... (full suite)

All existing tests must still pass. No regressions.
acceptance_criteria: go build ./... succeeds; go test ./internal/worktree/... passes; go test ./... passes
